definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: Businessmen take a walk in Tokyo's downtown financial districts of Otemachi and Marunouchi.
sentences.chinese: 商人們走在東京市中心金融區大手町和丸之內。

sentences.english: I like the financial district, actually.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我喜歡這裏的金融區。

sentences.english: During this era, new development of the Financial District had stagnated .
sentences.chinese: 在這個時代，新發展的金融區已停滯不前。

sentences.english: Take the Shanghai Maglev Train from Pudong International Airport to the Lujiazui financial district.
sentences.chinese: 從浦東國際機場乘坐磁懸浮列車到陸家嘴金融區。

sentences.english: Like the financial district is becoming a little bit cheaper to live in.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，金融區房價變得越來越便宜。

sentences.english: The Kerry Centre Hotel is where you need to be if you're working in the financial district.
sentences.chinese: 嘉裏中心飯店是你的選擇，如果你在金融區工作。

definition: Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
